subproject.corporate outcome: Livelihoods and economic recovery generated, including infrastructure restoration, employment and sustainable income earning opportunities for crisis affected communities
subproject.description:
1. Micro-credit Schemes Established
2. Increased food security for communities
3. Trained Community Management Committees
4. Skilled women entrepreneurs
5. Sustainable use of natural resources
6. HIV and AIDS mainstreamed
subproject.title: Recovery & Rehabilitation at C

subproject.corporate outcome: Effective, responsive, accessible and fair justice systems promote the rule of law, including both formal and informal processes, with due consideration on the rights of the poor, women and vulnerable groups
subproject.description:
1. A UN-HABITAT office established; administrative routines and equipment in place
3. Pilot programmes on local governance and human settlement undertaken
subproject.title: Support to UN Habitat
